metadata.title: CVE-2024-41946 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: REXML is an XML toolkit for Ruby. The REXML gem 3.3.2 has a DoSvulnerability when it parses an XML that has many entity expansions withSAX2 or pull parser API. The REXML gem 3.3.3 or later include the patch tofix the vulnerability.

criterions.comment: ruby2.3 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
jruby package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
